title: Increase automated spam-prevention timer
body: I find myself facing the "commenting too quickly" message far more than I would like. All my posts aren't spam, they're just normal messages. Whatever threshold is currently set is not long enough. In fact, why doesn't it use the same system as the ping spam prevention (where it's not just a simple timer preventing you from pinging multiple times in one instant, but an adaptive timer which changes based on how often you've pinged just a moment before)?

replies.body: It does seem a little stuffed to me. When I logged on yesterday I made 1 post, went to do another and was told I was commenting too quickly and there was a good few minutes in between those posts.
